0.4.2.name: wordpress/improved-include-page
0.4.2.description:
Improved Include Page is an expanded version of the original Include Page developed by Brent Loertscher and it was developed to add some features I needed.

Key Features

  • Page title display with optional HTML code,
  • Content display with different styles (full, teaser, custom ‘more’ link),
  • Wordpress filters applied to both the content and the title,
  • Supports Wordpress 2.5.x Shortcode API

Version Notes 0.4.8

  • Fixed bug which broke the ID style inclusion on WP 3.0 (thanks to Mike Woods, Brad Lauster and wptk)
  • Fixed a bug on the 'more' link which caused too many slashes when using images as 'more tags' (thanks to Nikhil Dabas) Note: if you use HTML code in the 'more' link use single quotes for the 'more' parameter, like this: [include-page id="mypage" more=''] or you will have a PHP Warning
  • Fixed a bug in the displayTitle attribute: using "false" you will get a real boolea
